name: A Reddit Nightly : Dark Clean Night Theme RES
description:
Darker Reddit Theme With Ad and sponsored link banners removed. 
Custom header and tabs and lovely static background along with tweaked buttons and sidebar.

-RedditEntertainmentSuite plugin Recommended / Optimized-

NOTE: 
      All subreddits have the chance of being exempt from global settings of this script as some 
      content can be user-specific. The creator of the individual sub reddit may have content that 
      conflicts with this script and the best I can do is try to work around it. 
      
      IF YOU COME ACROSS A SUBREDDIT THAT IS BROKEN, UNCHECK THE 
      "USE THIS SUBREDDITS STYLE" button in the sidebar for a temporary fix. 
      Please list the name of the sub and the issue in discussions below. 
      I will look into it asap! :)
additional_info:
4/09/13 - First Release (beta)
4/10/13 - RES Optimized - Fixed Tab, Userbar and Shortcut bar transparency. Fix for NeverEndingReddit
4/11/13 - Fixed Comments background, Borders and RES items
4/13/13 - Changed linkbox / default text
4/14/13 - Fixed text / background / comment settings in attempt for global effect across subreddits
4/15/13 - Changed Background Brightness, Changed link / text wrap color to light blue (RES only)       
4/17/13 - Slight change to submit buttons. Made subreddit description box transparent.
4/18/13 - Added black / grey colors to search results page
4/20/13 - Small change to linkinfo text color
4/25/13 - Added theme to RES username hover box 
5/1/13 - Small change to "submit" page
5/19/13 - Added background color to RES toolbar dropdown windows
7/10/13 - Small tweak to RES buttons
7/25/13 - Tweaked new Multireddit bar as best as I could ( hope they remove that stupid thing)
4/14/14 - Multiple Updates and Comment Area Fix
6/12/14 - Replaced Background
5/1/15  - Resurrecting this once more with all fixes I've made on my local PC since last update.
          Should fix any graphical glitches encountered with older versions.

Feel free to share any modifications or fixes via discussions thread below!

discussions.name: I love it, but comment section doesn't work on every subreddit..
